description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from WinRM host process Author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades), Markus Neis. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Shells Spawn by WinRM
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\wsmprovhost.exe AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\whoami.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe))
